string-array.name: cathedral
string-array.item: Saint Joseph is the largest Catholic cathedral in Bulgaria. It avails 350 seats and can hold up to 1,000 worshipers. The cathedral is 22 m long, 16 meters wide, 19 meters high is the main body of the building with a roof height of 23 meters. The tower is equipped with four electronically operated bells, and is 34 meters high. Over the altar stands a 8 meters high wooden cross , and below is the icon of St. Mary.

Working Hours: \nYou can appoint a meeting at the Parish office on our phone number, from 9 am to 15 pm. You can arrange all the matters for the Sacraments: The Sacrament of Baptism, The Sacrament of Anointing of The Sick and The sacrament of Marriage, at the Parish office. You can also make an appointment for the Sacrament of Anointing of The Sick on our phone number.
Address: 146, Kniaz Boris I Str., 1301 Sofia (Click to see on the map)
